title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 565.5 - Accidents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 565.5 - Accidents

State Regulations

All motor vehicle accidents on campus which cause
personal and/or property damage, regardless of how slight, must be reported to
the University Police for necessary action. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
565.5

Amended, New

York State Register August 27, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 34, eff. 8/27/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
